WHO	acknowledges	the	generous	contribution	of	over	80	individuals	and	organizations	in	
the	field	of	maternal	and	neonatal	health	who	took	time	to	review	this	document	at	different	
stages	of	its	development.
The	funding	towards	the	preparation	and	production	of	this	document	provided	by	the		
Governments	of	Australia,	Italy	and	USA	is	gratefully	acknowledged.	In	addition,	WHOâ€™s	
Making	Pregnancy	Safer	Department	is	grateful	to	the	Governments	of	Denmark,	Ireland,
